gameInfo.controlsInfo: To move as the MovingAvatar, use the four arrow keys to move.

winRules.text: If butterfly (animal) and avatar (animal) collide, then the butterfly (animal) sprite will be destroyed.
If there are no more butterfly (animal) sprites then you will win.

loseRules.text: If cocoon (Immovable) and butterfly (animal) collide, then the cocoon (Immovable) sprite will be destroyed.
If there are no more cocoon (Immovable) sprites then you will lose.

pointsRules.text: If the butterfly (animal) and the avatar (animal) collide, then you will gain 2 points.
